mapper.select: SELECT pro.product_no as product_no, pro.pro_name as pro_name, pro.pro_price as pro_price, img.pro_img_url as pro_img_url FROM PRODUCT pro JOIN SHOES shoe ON pro.product_no = shoe.product_no join PRO_IMG_URL img on pro.product_no = img.product_no WHERE img.PRO_IMG_URL LIKE '%_1' GROUP BY pro.product_no, pro.pro_name, pro.pro_price, img.pro_img_url

SELECT p.product_no as product_no, p.pro_name as pro_name, p.pro_price as pro_price, tba.category as category FROM product p JOIN top_bottom_acc tba ON p.product_no = tba.product_no WHERE tba.category like '%[T]%' ORDER BY p.pro_name
